nodes.text: You know, I really thought that you and Katie would be a great couple.
You'll get over her, Aeolus. I'm sure that you will find the right person for you.

options.text: Bluff About Your Lie that Katie Likes Aeolus

nodes.text: Look, Aeolus, there's no nicer guy here than you. I thought that Katie would see what a great person you are when you talked to her. You are talented and clever. Katie must be blind if she can't see that in you.

options.text: Justify Your Lie that Katie Likes Aeolus

nodes.text: Katie acted like she liked you. How was I to know that she was just pretending? Here I thought I'd help you by getting you to talk to her. I didn't know that she was so shallow.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Get Over It

nodes.text: Don't sit there moping about how you lost Katie's love. You didn't have it in the first place. Get real about this - so Katie isn't right for you - so what? You'll fall in love with someone else soon enough.

So Katie keelhauled your heart and scuttled your dreamboat? Clearly she's too brined to sea how shellfish she is acting towards you. She must be hard of herring not to be hooked by your singing. You are the cod of song whiting.

options.text: Try to Talk Aeolus Out of His Gloom

nodes.text: Hey, Aeolus, I know that there's a perfect person for you, and Katie just wasn't the right one. You need someone who enjoys music. Someone who laughs at your jokes and encourages you to make more. That's the right person for you.

options.text: Try to Snap Aeolus Out of His Depression

nodes.text: Look - sitting around feeling sorry for yourself only makes things worse. You need to turn your heartbreak into a song or drown your sorrow in a jam session. Get some exercise. Just let your grief fade.
Katie is a great person. I can understand why you love her. I'm in love with her for many of the same reasons.

options.text: Tell Aeolus to Stop Playing His Panpipes

nodes.text: You should stop playing and try to get some sleep. You'll feel much better in the morning.
Don't be so overly dramatic just because Katie doesn't like you. Stop playing and get over it.
Go to sleep, Aeolus. It'll be better tomorrow.
